report.title: Quadrat and box core photos
report.description: Lists both photos at the quadrat/box core sample level and the species photos for these 2 surveys.
report.query: select #columns# from samples s join samples sc on sc.parent_id=s.id and sc.deleted=false left join sample_attribute_values v on v.sample_id=sc.id and v.sample_attribute_id=1367 left join sample_media sm on sm.sample_id=sc.id and sm.deleted=false left join occurrences o on o.sample_id=sc.id and o.deleted=false left join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id left join occurrence_media om on om.occurrence_id=o.id and om.deleted=false #joins# where s.survey_id in (558, 559) and s.created_by_id=#user_id# and s.parent_id is null and s.deleted=false and (om.id is not null or sm.id is not null)

param.name: user_id
param.description: ID of the user to show surveys for
